meanings.definition: A type of alcoholic beverage made from fermented grain mash.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy trying different whiskeys from around the world.
meanings.sent2: The bar offers a wide selection of whiskeys for customers to choose from.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the whiskeys seemed to dance in the glasses as people chatted.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the whiskeys filled the room, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The bartender's knowledge of whiskeys was impressive, guiding us to the perfect choice.
